pages.text: To place a $(item)Marshmallow$() on a stick, hold a $(item)Marshmallow$() in your off-hand, a $(item)Marshmallow Stick$() in your main hand, and $(use) while sneaking.$(p)$(info) A $(item)Roasted Marshmallow$() can be eaten from the stick.

To roast a $(item)Marshmallow$() on a stick, stand near a $(item)Campfire$() and hold $(use) until it turns a nice golden brown.$(p)$(info) A $(item)Roasted Marshmallow$() can be removed by $(use) while sneaking with an empty off-hand.
